name: AnimeForum
short: Create and manage anime forum channels with MyAnimeList integration
description: A comprehensive cog for creating and managing anime-themed forum channels in Discord, with rich MyAnimeList integration, analytics, scheduling, and event management.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores data about users' anime preferences and forum activity to provide personalized recommendations and analytics features. User IDs are stored alongside anime preferences and forum activity data.
author: Claude
